title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: There is a delay of approximately 30 seconds when updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature. The bug report suggests that a busy cursor should be shown during this time.
OB: Currently, there is no indication to the user that the table is being updated, resulting in confusion and frustration.
EB: The checkboxes should trigger a busy cursor when the state is being updated, providing visual feedback to the user.
SR: Implement the use of a busy cursor when updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature to improve the user experience.
